00048 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 void MainWindow::keyPressEvent(
00050                                QKeyEvent *_event
00051                               )
00052 {
00053   // this method is called every time the main window recives a key event.
00054   // we then switch on the key value and set the camera in the GLWindow
00055   switch (_event->key())
00056   {
00057   case Qt::Key_Escape : QApplication::exit(EXIT_SUCCESS); break;
00058   case Qt::Key_W : glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_LINE); break;
00059   case Qt::Key_S : glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL); break;
00060 
00061 
00062   default : break;
00063 
00064   }
00065    m_gl->updateGL();
00066 }
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 
00069 void MainWindow::drawWireframe(bool _mode)
00070 {
00071     if(_mode == true)
00072     {
00073          glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_LINE);
00074     }
00075     else
00076     {
00077         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL);
00078     }
00079 
00080 }
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void MainWindow::loadTexFile()
00083 {
00084     QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,tr("Open File"), "/path/to/file/");
00085     m_ui->m_filepath->setText(fileName);
00086     m_gl->setTexFileName(fileName.toStdString());
00087 }
